reviews.review_msg: All the previous reviews with ratings similar to mine say enough.

Kevin's a good teacher but he has a kind of jaded attitude towards students. Attendance seriously matters, he gives handouts that are not posted online. The textbook is used regularly, and although there is a LOT of (sometimes challenging) content to cover, I think he teaches it well. If you take 202 with him, just be prepared to work hard.

I have no positives about this guy as a prof. He can't teach and relies on the textbook and other classes to do the teaching for him. He is condescending towards his students and has spoken poorly of other profs. He has an ego and blames students for their study habits instead of his own teaching abilities. Avoid.
